alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:12PM MDT until April 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, some agricultural land between 60th Street North and Interstate 90 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 12.1 feet tonight. It will then begin to fall. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Sioux River Sioux Falls I-9 12.0 12.1 Fri 8 pm 12.0 12.0 11.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday.
